params.shareAmount: Amount of shares to calculate for

returns.withdrawalAmount: Amount of token1 that would be withdrawn

params._manager: Address that can call any address
params._runTimestamp: Timestamp when deposits close and manager operations begin
params._token1: The ERC20 token that can be deposited into the vault
params._token2: The second ERC20 token (available for manager operations)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateWithdrawalAmount(uint256).notice: Calculate withdrawal amount for a given share amount

constructor.notice: Initialize the vault with configuration parameters

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit token1 into the vault (only before run timestamp)

emergencyRecover(address,address,uint256.notice: Emergency function to recover stuck tokens (only owner)

execute(address,bytes).notice: Manager can call any address (only after run timestamp)

manager().notice: Manager address that can call any address

runTimestamp().notice: Timestamp when deposits close and manager operations begin

shares(address).notice: Mapping of shareholder address to their share amount

token1().notice: The token that can be deposited into the vault

token2().notice: The second token (available for manager operations)

updateVault(address,address,uint256,uint.notice: Update vault configuration (only manager, only when vault is closed)

vaultClosed().notice: Whether the vault is closed (after withdrawal)

withdraw().notice: Withdraw token1 from the vault to all shareholders (only manager, only after stop timestamp)
